content: moda dea scallop wrap wayback internet archive 1 there is no archived written pattern or pdf for the coats & clarke lacy wrap anymore it leads only to a picture however moda dea which was the recommended yarn also had nearly the same wrap called the scallop wrap lm0258 by gayle bunn it looks identical to the lacy wrap and a coats trademark on it i linked to the moda dea pattern available through the wayback archive but it also has a page here on ravelry with the usual notes and pics https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/scallop-wrap-lm0258 according to some old blog posts there were a few minor differences so the patterns are not perfectly interchangeable i did also read the c & c lacy wrap was poorly written with errors so maybe it s a different edit of the same pattern you can judge for yourselves but the two wraps look the same to me i spent a long time chasing down this lovely pattern i hope others enjoy it 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/scallop-wrap-lm0258
